item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Please don't use page tags to advertise your character and your village, as page tags are being used here as a catagorization feature. The appropriate page tag for a character page is 'players' rather than the character's name.

Also, while the sigs do tend to be fine with being linked from elsewhere, please don't include other images from the BvS site on your page when it's not necessary ( in reference to the Trophies section ).
